import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update user options/preferences"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/{UserId}/options"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates a user's personal options and preference settings, such as notification toggles and other profile-level configuration stored under `UserOptions`. Use this endpoint when an administrator or integration needs to update another user's settings; for self-service updates, prefer [POST /api/v1.0/users/my/options](/docs/api/users/set-my-options).

**Prerequisites**
1. **UserId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/users/search/\{Query\}](/docs/api/users/search-users-by-keyword) or [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) to locate the user and extract `Items[].UserId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Find the user: [GET /api/v1.0/users/search/\{Query\}](/docs/api/users/search-users-by-keyword) -&gt; capture `UserId`.
2. Build the `UserOptions` payload (for example, update notification booleans).
3. Submit [POST /api/v1.0/users/\{UserId\}/options](/docs/api/users/set-user-options) to persist the changes.

**Minimal Required Fields**: UserId (path) and a request body object. If setting `Notifications`, include all required fields in the `UserNotificationSettings` schema.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"UserId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"User identifier.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"51c89694-ae9f-f011-8e61-6045bd7991ab"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"User preferences and options. Mirrors `Spark.Shared.Models.UserOptions`.","properties":{"Notifications":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Notification settings for a user. Mirrors `Spark.Shared.Models.UserOptionsNotifications`.","properties":{"TicketCreated":{"type":"boolean","description":"Receive notifications when a ticket is created."},"TicketUpdated":{"type":"boolean","description":"Receive notifications when a ticket is updated."},"TicketAssignedToYou":{"type":"boolean","description":"Receive notifications when a ticket is assigned to you."},"TicketAssignedToTeam":{"type":"boolean","description":"Receive notifications when a ticket is assigned to your team."},"TicketDisableFollowerNotifications":{"type":"boolean","description":"Disable notifications for tickets you are following."},"AssetChanged":{"type":"boolean","description":"Receive notifications when an asset is changed."}},"title":"UserNotificationSettings"}],"description":"Notification settings for the user.","nullable":true,"type":"object"},"Locations":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Location preferences for a user. Mirrors `Spark.Shared.Models.UserOptionsLocations`.","properties":{"FavoriteLocations":{"type":"array","description":"List of favorite location UUIDs for quick access.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"nullable":true}},"title":"UserOptionsLocations"}],"description":"Location preferences for the user.","nullable":true,"type":"object"}},"additionalProperties":true,"title":"UserOptions"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
